name: L'arcadiNoè
0:
”Alexa, open noa's ark”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noa's ark
des: Noa's Ark is an interactive Alexa Skill that can be used for children to have fun and to learn something at the same time. The skill contains over then 30 animals sounds
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
